downloadDescription: The Lync for Mac 2011 Deployment Guide is for system implementers, IT managers, system administrators, or other people who plan for, implement, and maintain Lync in their organizations.
detailsSection:
The Lync for Mac 2011 Deployment Guide is for system implementers, IT managers, system administrators, or other people who plan for, implement, and maintain Lync in their organizations.

Lync is available as a standalone edition for volume licensing customers.

Note:   You can also view the Lync for Mac 2011 Deployment Guide online.

The Lync for Mac 2011 Deployment Guide covers the following:
  • Getting Started
    Overview
    Features in Lync for Mac 2011
    System requirements for Lync for Mac 2011

  • Installing and Configuring Lync for Mac 2011 on a Corporate Network
    Deploying Lync for Mac 2011
    Removing Lync for Mac 2011
    Deploying Lync for Mac 2011 preferences

  • Technical Reference
    Lync for Mac 2011 and Office for Mac 2011
    Lync for Mac 2011 Integration Requirements
    Lync for Mac 2011 - Managed Preferences
    Lync for Mac 2011 and Public Instant Messaging Clients
    Compare Lync for Mac 2011 with Communicator for Mac and Lync 2010 for Windows
systemRequirementsSection: Note: To view the Lync for Mac 2011 Deployment Guide .pdf in Windows, you will need the free software program, Adobe Reader. or you can view an online version here.
installInstructionSection:
Note:   You can also view the Lync for Mac 2011 Deployment Guide online.

To install this download on Mac OS X:
  1. Print this page if you want to use it as a reference when you are offline.
  2. Click the download.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to save the file to your hard disk. If you are using Safari, the downloaded file is saved to the desktop unless you specified a different location in the Preferences dialog box of Safari. To check your preferences, on the Safari menu, click Preferences, and then click General).
  4. On your hard disk, double-click the file that you downloaded.

To install this download on Windows:
  1. Print this page if you want to use it as a reference when you are offline.
  2. Click the download.
  3. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.
  4. On your hard disk, double-click the file that you downloaded.
